about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I build scalable applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js. My work focuses on performance, accessibility, and elegant design.
highlights: Expert in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js
Clean code, modular design, and UI performance
Always learning and applying modern practices
